person.persName: John Hunt Morgan (Lexington, Ky, brigadier general (C.S.A.))

body.p: Lexington, Kentucky, soldier. Huntsville, Alabama native. Son of Calvin Cogswell Morgan and Henrietta Hunt Morgan. Married to Rebecca Gratz Bruce Morgan in Lexington, Kentucky, on November 21, 1848. Married to Martha Ready Morgan on December 14, 1862. Father of Johnnie Hunt Morgan. Served as first lieutenant in the Mexican American War. Resident of Fayette County, Kentucky, in 1850. Raised the "Lexington Rifles" infantry company in Lexington in 1857. Manufacturer in Lexington in 1860. Served in the 2nd Kentucky Cavalry (C.S.A.), or "Morgan's Raiders," as a captain and colonel from October 27, 1861 to April 4, 1862. Promoted to brigadier general on December 13, 1862. Killed in Greenville, Tennessee, on September 4, 1864, by federal cavalry.
